subject: Collaboration Proposal – Product Review on YouTube @begamers24
description_text:
Hello,  my name is Andrea, and I’m one of the two founders of the YouTube channel "BeGamers24" (https://youtube.com/@begamers24?si=gn4nZzepB3Wt8iKU), where we cover gaming in all its forms (flat, VR, and simracing) on consoles and PC.
We’re very interested in reviewing one of your ....... products on our channel. In return, we would offer visibility through dedicated videos, mentions, banners, and tracked links in the descriptions. We're also open to affiliate partnerships or discount coupon collaborations for our subscribers.
If you're interested, we’d be happy to discuss how to proceed.
Best regards,  Andrea.BeGamers24
Yahoo Mail: cerca, organizza, prendi il controllo della tua casella di posta
